Relaso CRM

A comprehensive platform for managing customer relationships, streamlining communication, and business growth through advanced tools designed to improve efficiency, and customer satisfaction.

Relaso Hospitech

Empowering healthcare equipment distributors with seamless lead management, automated workflows, and real-time insights.

Relaso Clinic

Designed for clinics to manage patient appointments, streamline interactions, and improve overall service delivery, ensuring a seamless and efficient healthcare experience.

Relaso Examination

Automate the entire exam process—from candidate registration to result publication. Seamless experiences for administrators, evaluators, and candidates alike.

Relaso HelpDesk

Exceptional customer support with efficient ticket management. Track, prioritize, and resolve queries faster while enhancing customer satisfaction and boosting team productivity effortlessly.

Relaso for Law Firms

A specialized solution for legal professionals, offering tools to manage cases, streamline billing, and organize documentation for improved productivity and client service.
